ygData.subject: Waki or Yaki... Was Claw Hype
ygData.msgSnippet: Agreed, the Claws are far better until 28 when the Staff begins to Proc ;) Once it starts to proc, especially with a good Dex, then you can switch ;) But in
ygData.messageBody:
Agreed, the Claws are far better until 28 when the Staff begins to Proc ;)
Once it starts to proc, especially with a good Dex, then you can switch ;)
But in the meantime don't neglect your 1h blunt skill!

As to the point about the Wak or Yak...

A LOT of discussion went into these on the Ranger's boards. If you aren't
worried about the Taunt of the YAK then that is definitely the way to go.
Even though it has a lower dmg curve the Proc causes the Yak to out-dmg
(rather significantly) the Wak, even if it only proc's once during a fight.
However, the dmg loss isn't significant to outweigh the greatly reduced
taunt factor if that is a major concern for you.

A lot of bards opt for the Wakizashi because:
a) Taunts less
b) Looks nicer

It's really a personal choice. I almost never use weapons myself so I'm not
that concerned ;)

Lyrnia Jongleur
----- Original Message -----
From: <John_Senior@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, March 31, 2000 11:49 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] thulian claw hype?


> I wouldn't bother with the Staff until it proc's. This happens at level
28,
> only then will the Staff of Writhing be better that the Claw:
>
> Using the Formula someone posted we can see that the claw is better (only
> slightly):
>
> Claw - 5 x 2 +1 = 11 / 19 = 0.578
> Staff - 9 x 2 +1 = 19 / 33 = 0.575
>
> The claw is only slightly better but considering it is lighter, and does
> not have -9 charisma then it is by far the better item. I also prefer the
> claws look over "The Ugly Stick".
>
> Like I said though, once you get to level 28 (might be 27, I forgot), the
> Staff of Writhing will be a nice weapon to wield as the proc can change
the
> way a fight is going.
>
> Hope this helps.
>
> Now my question. I notice the Yak is worse than the wazi:
>
> yak = 0.708
> Wazi = 0.714
>
> Does anyone recommend I chop my Yaks in for some Maid/Butler Fangs, I am
> nearly level 43 and never solo, so would I be better with a proc'less
> weapon to reduce taunt factor??
>
> Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 43 levels and only 42 Songs <Guardians of
> Light>
> Veeshan Server
>
>
>
>
